meanings.definition: A person who follows or advocates modern ideas, trends, or styles.
meanings.sent1: The group of modernists gathered to discuss the latest art movements.
meanings.sent2: Many modernists enjoy experimenting with new technologies.
meanings.sent3: The modernists decided to host a futuristic-themed party to embrace their style.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, modernists are the trailblazers of innovation.
meanings.sent5: The modernists' bold and daring approach to design sets them apart from traditionalists.

meanings.sent1: Her modernists-inspired artwork was displayed in the gallery.

meanings.sent3: The modernists-themed cafe served avant-garde dishes in a futuristic setting.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was a modernists masterpiece, with towering glass skyscrapers.
meanings.sent5: The modernists aesthetic focused on simplicity and innovation in every aspect.
